name: PacifistAngel
description:
PacifistAngel

This game was created for the MiniJam 87: Break, with the limitation: "The Player is a Pacifist".

You are an pacifistic angel and have to stop all the bullets, the violent enemies are shooting at each other in this "in-place 2d platformer".

I didn't have time to create a sounddesign, which didn't annoy me so i left it out.

The Web-Version had issues with my Depth of Field effect so i removed it. Download the executable for the full experience.
